description.general.borderOpacity: ðŸ“Œ: Opacity of decoration border in __```%```__. __```1```__ being opaque.
description.general.backgroundOpacity: ðŸ“Œ: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ being opaque.
description.cursorOnly.borderColor:
ðŸ“Œ: Change the border color. 

Must be in format of hex color representation as __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.cursorOnly.backgroundColor:
ðŸ“Œ: Change the background color. 

Must be in format of hex color representation as __```#RRGGBB```__, __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.cursorOnly.borderPosition: ðŸ“Œ: Border position on current selection.
description.cursorOnly.borderWidth: ðŸ“Œ: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
description.cursorOnly.borderStyle: ðŸ“Œ: Main Border style on current line.

description.singleLine.borderWidth: ðŸ“Œ: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
description.singleLine.borderStyle: ðŸ“Œ: Border style on current selection.

description.selectionText.enabled: ðŸ“Œ: Enable inline selection status text.
description.selectionText.color:
ðŸ“Œ: Change the Inline Status Text color. 

Must be in format of hex color representation as __```#RRGGBB```__.

ðŸ“Œ: Change the Inline Status Text background color.

description.selectionText.opacity: ðŸ“Œ: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ being opaque.
description.selectionText.fontStyle: ðŸ“Œ: Font style of selection status.
description.selectionText.fontWeight: ðŸ“Œ: Font weight of selection status.
description.selectionText.cursorOnlyText:
ðŸ“Œ: Status Text for _'Cursor Only Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${col}```__ | Current position of cursor (as on status bar) |
| __```${zCol}```__ | Count of characters in line (Zero based)|
| __```${ln}```__ | Current line number |
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture | 

Example: `< Editing ... At (idx ${zCol}, zero-based)`
description.selectionText.singleLineText:
ðŸ“Œ: Status Text for _'Single Line Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${char}```__ | Character count of selection |
| __```${ln}```__ | Current line number |
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture |

Example: `< Selection ... Of (${char} Characters)`

description.selectionText.multiCursorTex:
ðŸ“Œ: Status Text for _'Multi Cursor Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${nth}```__ | Position of selection |
| __```${count}```__ | Count of selection |
| __```${lc}```__ | Total line count of selection |
| __```${ln}```__ | Selection line number of last line |
| __```${char}```__ | Total character count of selection |
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture |

Example: `< Multi Selection ... Of (${nth} of ${count}, with Total ${lc} Lines ${char} Characters)`
description.selectionText.selectionCount:
ðŸ“Œ: _'designated'_ text Style configuration for the placeholders. Each Placeholder _'shares'_ the same configuration across the board of different selection type.
| Item | Description |
| --------------- | ------- |
| __```ln```__ | Designated color for the __```${ln}```__ (line number) |
| __```col```__ | Designated color for the __```${col}```__  (column position)|
| __```zCol```__ | Designated color for the __```${zCol}```__ (zero column position)|
| __```char```__ | Designated color for the __```${char}```__ (character count in selection)|
| __```lc```__ | Designated color for the __```${lc}```__ (line count in selection)|
| __```nth```__ | Designated color for the __```${nth}```__ (nth of selections: multi-cursor)|
| __```count```__ | Designated color for the __```${count}```__ (count of of selections: multi-cursor)|
| __```opacity```__ | Shared opacity for the placeholder text only |
| __```fontStyle```__ | Shared font style for the placeholder text only |
| __```fontWeight```__ | Shared font weight for the placeholder text only |
description.diagnosticText.leftMargin: ðŸ“Œ: Left margin for the diagonostic status.
description.diagnosticText.visibility: ðŸ“Œ: Configuration of visibility of the diagnostic status. Confuration item name should be sufficent enough as it is self-explanatory.
description.diagnosticText.glyphList: ðŸ“Œ: These glyphs will be displayed next to probblems of __'Editor'__ if there is any. Only __`lineEqual`__ glyph will be displayed When the cursor is on the problem line, Otherwise problem line indicator for both __`lineUp`and `lineDown`__.
description.diagnosticText.diagnosticPla: ðŸ“Œ: Template Fixture Text style of Placeholder __`Problem Placeholder Content Text`__ and __`All Ok Placeholder Content Text`__.
description.diagnosticText.problemPlaceh:
ðŸ“Œ: Format of diagnostic text for when _'problems'_ are visible.

| Placeholder | Description |
| --------------- | ------- |
| __```${editor}```__ | Current editor problem information collection group. |
| __```${workspace}```__ | Current workspace problem information collections group. |
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture |
description.diagnosticText.allOkPlacehol:
ðŸ“Œ: Format of diagnostic text for when _'no problems'_ are visible. This is override for when  __'visibility -> overrideAllOk' is set to `true. `__

| Placeholder | Description |
| --------------- | ------- |
| __```${allOk}```__ | Current editor/workspace problem information collections|
|| This placeholder refers to __' -> OK All Content Text'__| 
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture |
description.diagnosticText.okWorkspaceCo:
ðŸ“Œ: Format of if no problems are visible in current workspace.

| Placeholder | Description |
| --------------- | ------- |
| __```${pre}```__ | Static prefix that can be styled diffrerently from placeholder body.|
|| This placeholder refers to __' -> OK Noation Text Style -> workspacePrefix'__| 
| __```${post}```__ | Static post that can be styled diffrerently from placeholder body.|
|| This placeholder refers to __' -> OK Noation Text Style -> workspacePostfix'__| 
| __```...others```__ | Template Fixture |
